children.value: Time and Place: MWF 12-12:50am (Section X13/X14), 165 Noyes Laboratory
Office Hour: Mon 1pm, or by appointment (either Zoom or in-person)
Vectors and Transformations in Plane Geometry
(Code is available on the Moodle course page.)
Prerequisite: MATH 241; MATH 347 or 348, or equivalent
Centroid of a finitely many points (Sec 1.8)
Angles and Equation of a line (Sec 3.6-7)
